title: [BUG] SkiaSharp crashes on Google Pixel 6 Pro in certain cases (works on other phones)
body:
**Description**

We have a mobile game that draws its screen using Xamarin.Forms and SKGLView. The game has a zoom-in and zoom-out feature. The Android version of the game works on other Android phones but crashes on Google Pixel 6 Pro (which is using Google Tensor).

Steps to reproduce:
1. Install GnollHack on Google Pixel 6 Pro: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.soundmindentertainment.gnollhack
2. Start the game with any character.
3. Click the world icon in the top-right corner to zoom out.
4. The game immediately crashes.

The stack trace in Google Play Console is the following (in Crashes and ANRs):
```
  #00  pc 0x000000000004b840  /apex/com.android.runtime/lib64/bionic/libc.so (__memcpy)
  #00  pc 0x0000000000761304  /vendor/lib64/egl/libGLES_mali.so
  #00  pc 0x00000000007886f8  /vendor/lib64/egl/libGLES_mali.so
  #00  pc 0x000000000076880c  /vendor/lib64/egl/libGLES_mali.so
  #00  pc 0x000000000070d5c8  /vendor/lib64/egl/libGLES_mali.so
  #00  pc 0x00000000002a04f0  /data/app/~~oTNqPNewwEuNK1kY9zcycA==/com.soundmindentertainment.gnollhack-0Tl1bC3mrLN6t3tiD-Qkmw==/split_config.arm64_v8a.apk!libSkiaSharp.so
```

You can deactivate GPU Acceleration in the settings, and then the game uses SKCanvasView for drawing. It works perfectly. So, the problem is apparently the GPU drivers of Google Pixel 6 Pro.

**Code**

The game is open source. You can find its code here:
https://github.com/hyvanmielenpelit/GnollHack

Android build instructions are here:
https://github.com/hyvanmielenpelit/GnollHack/wiki/Build-Instructions-for-Android-Version-on-Windows

**Expected Behavior**

The game will not crash, when zooming out.

**Actual Behavior**

The game crashes, when zooming out.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.3 and 2.80.4
- Last known good version:  -
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022 Community (Windows) 17.3.0
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: 11.0 (R)
- Target Devices:  Google Pixel 6 Pro
